headline: 3 Days Later, Indonesia Frees U.S. Reporter
abstract: The authorities had threatened a yearslong prison sentence for Philip Jacobson, who was jailed for three days. He is likely to be deported soon, but his movements remain restricted.
lead_paragraph: JAKARTA, Indonesia â€” An American environmental journalist accused of violating the terms of his visa has been freed after three days in jail and is likely to be deported soon, a top Indonesian government minister said.
keywords: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
